mapper.insert:
insert into sale(sale_no, sale_time, sale_order_cnt, sale_order_kind, sale_type, mb_no, fd_no, sale_discount_info, sale_discount_price,sale_cancel) values
(#{item.saleNo}, #{item.saletime}, #{item.saleOrderCnt}, #{item.saleOrderKind}, #{item.saleType}, #{item.mbNo.mbNo}, #{item.fdNo.fdNo},#{item.saleDiscountInfo},#{item.saleDiscountPrice},#{item.saleCancel})
mapper.select: select no,sale_no,sale_time,sale_order_cnt,sale_order_kind,sale_type,f.fd_name,m.mb_name,sale_discount_info,sale_discount_price,sale_cancel from sale s left join food as f on s.fd_no = f.fd_no join member as m on s.mb_no = m.mb_no;

select no,sale_no,sale_time,sale_order_cnt,sale_order_kind,sale_type,f.fd_name,m.mb_name,sale_discount_info,sale_discount_price,sale_cancel from sale s left join food as f on s.fd_no = f.fd_no join member as m on s.mb_no = m.mb_no where sale_time like CONCAT(#{date},'%');
select * from sale order by no desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update sale set sale_cancel = #{cancel} where sale_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select sum(payPrice) as totalPrice from payment where payMemberNo = #{number} and payCancel=0;
